name: amira-letter-scoring-cdk
description: CDK infrastructure for Amira Letter Scoring GPU pipeline

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx cdk deploy -a 'node dist/bin/amira-letter-scoring.js'
scripts.destroy: npm run build && npx cdk destroy -a 'node dist/bin/amira-letter-scoring.js'
scripts.deploy-parallel: npm run build && npx cdk deploy -a 'node dist/bin/amira-lambda-parallel.js' AmiraLambdaParallelStack
scripts.destroy-parallel: npm run build && npx cdk destroy -a 'node dist/bin/amira-lambda-parallel.js' AmiraLambdaParallelStack
scripts.diff: npm run build && npx cdk diff
scripts.diff-parallel: npm run build && npx cdk diff -a 'node dist/bin/amira-lambda-parallel.js' AmiraLambdaParallelStack
scripts.synth: npm run build && npx cdk synth
scripts.synth-parallel: npm run build && npx cdk synth -a 'node dist/bin/amira-lambda-parallel.js' AmiraLambdaParallelStack
